Product Description

ABOUT VIWIK

Pouring our heart into serving the global vehicle owners! VIWIK adopt professional 3D laser analysis and try every floor mat model on it’s specific car model, accurate to every corner of the car.

If you are looking for the custom fit and qualified floor mats for your car, please look here. Once you choose us, we would take all reponsibility for making you satisified with our products and answering your inquiry within 10 hours.

VIWIK Floor Mats accompany and guard your every trip with super comfort, toughness and clearness!

COMPATIBILITY

Compatible with 2017-2022 Hond-a CR-V

Compatible with 2017 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2018 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2019 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2020 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring/ Hybrid EX/ Hybrid LX/ Hybrid EX-L/ Hybrid Touring

Compatible with 2021 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

Compatible with 2022 Hond-a CR-V EX/ LX/ EX-L/ Touring

ALL-WEATHER PROTECTION

Thickened 3 layer liners are fabulously durable and won’t be out of shape or break under any circumstance. The heavy duty TPE material can well withstand heat or coldness, good at all weather protection.

WHY CHOOSE VIWIK？ Non-Toxic and Odorless TPE Material Perfect Fit through Using 3D Printing Technology All-weather Protection of Upholstery Unique Groove Design Safe and None-Skidding Easy to Clean and Maintain Preserve the Resale Value A Perfect Solution for Dog Hair

PERFECT FIT

VIWIK Floor mats are compatible with the factory retention posts to keep your floor mats securely in place. Advanced 3D laser technology offers a Precise fit to your vehicle’s floor. No cutting, no trimming.

Tips: The floor mats may curl up a little due to being folded in the carton. We recommend you lay them flat for a day before installing them on the vehicle. Then they will precisely cover your car’s floor. Thank you for your understanding.

PACKAGE INCLUDES:

2 x Front Floor Liner

1 x Rear Floor Liner

1 x Installation Manual

PREMIUM TPE MATERIAL, TOUGH & DURABLE

Premium TPE material is non-toxic, odorless and durable. The floor liners also remain flexible under extreme temperature. Any external dirt or stains can be easily cleanned up and the mats are always fresh in a long time.

UNIQUE GROOVE DESIGN

Scientific channels and ridges of the car mats can perfectly trap the liquid, scraps, mud, snow, sand etc. Rugged edges keep all mess within the mats but far away your car. Easy to clean them just by wiping or rinsing.

ANTI-SKID DESIGN

Designed for your safe driving and walking around, non-skid corner nibs offer effective retention and make sure the floor mats stay firmly with no movement. Be especially protective to children and olders.

PRECISE FIT— VIWIK floor mats adopt 3D scanning analysis and multiple tryings with the specific car models, so there wouldn’t be any unfit problem. These car mats are custom fit for 2017 2018 2019 2020 2021 2022 Hond-a CR-V, no dead space, precisely covering your car’s floor and can be quickly putted in.
PREMIUM TPE MATERIAL— Made of 100% TPE material, these foor liners are environment-friendly, completely odorless so you can get rid of the unpleasant smell when in the car. They are born for super comfort, cleanness and very durable for use. No out of shape, stiff or break issues.
ALL WEATHER PROTECTION— Designed with rugged ridges, channels and heightened edges, the automotive floor mats can easily trap all kinds of liquid, scraps, mud, dirt, sand and snow etc, perfectly protecting your car in all weathers. Working well in extreme hot, cold or corrosive environments, the car floor mats are especially reliable.
NON-SLIP & EASY TO CLEAN— Rugged ridges are also designed for your safe driving and walking around. Non-skid corner nibs offer effective retention and make sure the floor mats stay firmly with no movement. Rest assured that childern and olders can freely walk on the floor mats. When clean the mats, just wipe with a wet cloth or take them out from the vehicle to rinse and dry.
WHAT EXTRA WE PROVIDE— Pouring our heart into serving the global vehicle owners! We accept lifetime return & replacement and welcome to ask us at any time if you have any question.

Caterpillar ToughRide Heavy-Duty 4 Piece Rubber Floor Mats For Car Truck Van SUV, Black – Premium Trim to Fit Car Floor Mats, All Weather Deep Dish Automotive Floor Mats, Total Dirt Protection.
Shape and Size is Engineered to Fit Most Cars, Trucks, Vans and SUVs. Made to be trimmable to fit your vehicle’s floor contours with only a pair of Scissors. No more having to strain your back from stuffing your mats just to get them to fit. Simply cut through the lines until you find the perfect fitment. Measurements: Front: 26″ x 20″ inch Rear: 20″ x 19″ inch
Trimmable to Fit Certain Trims of the following Vehicles – F-150; Silverado; Ram; RAV4; CRV; Accord; Prius; Wrangler; Pilot; Sentra; Traverse; Tucson; Escape; Outback; CX-5; Forester; Cherokee; Explorer; Equinox; Sierra; Tacoma; Highlander; Civic; Corolla; Camry; Rogue
Maximum Weather Protection – Protect your vehicle’s flooring by catching spills, stains, dirt and debris that other floor mats can miss. These mats are durable and long lasting and will withstand normal wear and tear.
Waterproof – The uniquely constructed linear and diagonal ridges are placed strategically within the deep dish of these mats to maximize its trapping capabilities. Water, snow, mud and debris are contained and will not escape or leak through into the vehicle’s interior.
No-Slip Grip – Rubberized nibs on the bottom so the mat always stays in place – Ergonomic grooves on top to give your foot more traction & comfort.

Read more

Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:16 UTC – Details)

Product Description

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

4- LAYER DESIGN

1 layer:100% polyester knitting surfac.

2 layer: Thickened super absorbent cotton.

3 layer: Breathable waterproof PUL inner layer; 100% polyester knitting fabric.

4 layer: Non-Slip silica gel bottom.

EFFICIENT ABSORPTION

The washable reusable pee pads are super absorption and non-leak, better to keep your pet and house clean. Ensure your indoor and outdoor furniture is protected against doggie wee accidents, floor water spills, and damage to your precious items.

LASTEST DESIGN

Our washable pee pads have cute patterns. Dogs and dog parents alike will love these designs.And 4 hole help you stick our pee pad on any flat surface so your dog never misses its mark.

COST-EFFICIENT: Our reusable pee pads for dogs ensure that fluids are absorbed and held for laundering without leaking. Washable and reusable puppy pads save you money and are good for our planet, our reusable puppy pee pads are good for 100+ washing cycles. Our pet pads are more cost-effective, of higher quality, and have a lower environmental impact than disposable pads that you constantly have to rebuy.
Durable & Comfortable: Our training pads are made of breathable waterproof PUL and a high-density inner layer which let the absorbency great and does not leak. 4 layers structure durable & comfortable, the first layer is a soft quilted fabric layer, the second layer is the absorbent layer, which can absorb 1000-1500ml of liquid, the third layer is the leak-proof layer, and the bottom layer is the anti-slip layer. Perfect for cars, sofas, beds, furniture, crates, and pet gate.
MULTI-USE: This reusable dog pad can be used for dog playpens, kennels, under food and water bowls, and cat litter boxes. It is helpful to protect our floors, sofas, and furniture away from damaged. Also can be used for car and RV travel, protecting car seats and car trunks. Our pads for dogs are perfect for pups of all ages. Use the pet pads to train puppies, and help senior or sick dogs use the bathroom in the right place.
What You Will Get: One package comes with 2 pack of reusable dog pee pads and 4 suction cup hook. 2 pack are really convenient for the busy pet owner, when the first get dirty, there is another one that can be changed, and that’s very convenient, your pets do not need to wait for the dirty one to wash and dry, and 2 pack keeps your house clean and your pet comfortable. We offer a 1-year guarantee, any problem, please feel free to contact us.
Reusable Puppy Pads: The washable pee pads for dogs are gray and have cute patterns on them, the reusable pee pads for dogs which is soft and comfortable could also provide funny for the puppy in travel. These waterproof reusable pee pads for dogs are a stylish choice! There are multi sizes to choose from, please choose a suitable size before placing an order. If you have any questions about the washable dog pee pads, please feel free to contact us.

GAGURL reusable pet pads made of 4 Layers material with silicone non-slip bottom, has strong absorption to liquid, could well to against the heaviest smell. It could well protect your pets from slide or pad movement. Ideal for training, playpen, cat litter box, crate, ultimate protection for floor, carpet, bed, furniture, sofa, car seat. Our durable pet pad can be reused while saving money.We at GAGURL spend countless hours in developing, sourcing, and testing our products. Our primary concerns are that everything we make is safe for pets and their owners, a quality item, and has great value.

Product Description

Waterproof & Easy to clean up!

We all love our pets, but no one enjoys a messy floor. Hoki found has a solution! We are offering the quality silicone mat to protect your floors! Built for Protection – Guard Against Spills, or Debris – Built to Last through Rain, Snow, Mud and More – Anti-Slip Backing – Set of Front, Rear & Trunk Liner for Full Protection
Simple Installation – Place the Mats on the Floor of your Vehicle after Trimming – Easily Remove and Clean the Mats of any Dirt & Spills
Our Advanced Performance Rubber Polymers are Tested for Extreme Conditions to Ensure they Don’t Crack, Split or Deform

Read more

All Season Heavy Duty Rubber Floor Mat Set

Protect your vehicle’s flooring by catching spills, stains, dirt and debris that other floor mats can miss. These mats are durable and long lasting and will withstand normal wear and tear.

No matter how careful you are, your new ride might become less-than-perfect with all the typical wear-and-tear that’s inflicted after owning any car for some time. So what can you do to protect your vehicle? You can have a piece of mind knowing your vehicle is up to date with the best accessories.

Features

  • Stain Protection
  • Custom Trim To Fit
  • Waterproof & Weatherproof
  • No-slip Grip Rubberized Nibs
  • Universal Fit most Cars, SUVs, Trucks and Vans

Read more

Highest Quality and Innovative Designs

Heavy Duty All Season Weather Protection

Our waterproof floor mats help trap spillage such as rain. Helps to keep your flooring dry.

Extra High Ridge-line Design

The extra high ridge line design will trap liquids and debris preventing them from reaching your original flooring. The trapped debris can easily be expelled by removing the mat and rinsing it off. This works especially well for rainy and/or snowy climates.

Strong Anti-Slip Backing

These mats are designed with an anti-slip backing. This helps to prevent the mats from slipping under pedals while driving. It keeps the mat in place as you get in and out of your vehicle.

Read more

Durable Material

Our material is an extremely flexible material used in new rubber floor mats for vehicles. These mats are very durable and can withstand various weather conditions such as extreme heat or extreme cold. They will not melt in high heat and will not crack in severe cold. This soft and flexible material provides for a long-lasting floor mat unlike other non-flexible mats that can crack under extreme conditions.

Read more

4
Price: $22.99 - $19.54
(as of Nov 28,2022 23:43:20 UTC – Details)
